document.full_text: almost a year after a scandal engulfed belgium, a parliamentary commission called for a new panel to adjudicate compensation claims for the hundreds of people who say they were the victims of predatory priests.
document.title: europe: belgium: call for sex-abuse panel
lines_and_colors: almost a year after a scandal engulfed belgium, a parliamentary commission called for a new panel to adjudicate compensation claims for the hundreds of people who say they were the victims of predatory priests.
